message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic deal on this product.  I'm willing to part with it for $14,000. Given its value, I believe this is a very fair offer.
Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm looking to get the best deal possible.  I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While your offer is reasonable, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down a bit to $13,000. This is my final offer, as I'm confident I can find other buyers at this price.
